query:
SELECT c.id, c.name_pt AS category_name, COUNT(p.id) AS product_count, 
GROUP_CONCAT(p.name_pt SEPARATOR ', ') AS products
FROM categories c
LEFT JOIN products p ON c.id = p.categoryId
GROUP BY c.id, c.name_pt
ORDER BY c.id;

GROUP_CONCAT(p.name_pt SEPARATOR ', ') AS products
